description: Isle of Man politicians will be asked to support giving terminally ill people the right to die.
title: Voluntary assisted dying to be debated by Tynwald
title_page: Voluntary assisted dying to be debated by Tynwald - BBC News
maintext: He said there had been "a change in public opinion" since the issue was last discussed politically and the time was right to consider "the idea that people should be given the right to control their own destiny".
